title: Election 2012 exit polls : percentage of votes by ethnicity
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes in Race Black and Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes in Race Black.
Among all the Races, Mitt Romney had the highest Percentage of votes 59.0 in Race White and lowest value 6.0 in Race Black.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Mitt Romney that was found in Race White was 9.83 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Race Black.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Barack Obama had the highest Percentage of votes in Race Black and Mitt Romney had the lowest Percentage of votes in Race Black.
Among all the Races, Mitt Romney had the highest Percentage of votes 59.0 in Race White and lowest value 6.0 in Race Black.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Mitt Romney that was found in Race White was 9.83 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Race Black.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Race Black had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Barack Obama. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Race Black for Mitt Romney.
In Race White, Mitt Romney had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Race Black out of all 4 Races.
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Mitt Romney in Race White and Black.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Percentage of votes was found in case of Barack Obama.
Averaging all 2 groups Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney, the Race Asian is the maximum Percentage of votes and White is the minimum Percentage of votes.
